channel.title: Ip ban..:S
channel.description:
Ok when i ipbanned some1 they still can login
Ive got no IP bann command but i add them to the bannedip list
Still they can login -.-
tell me how to fix plz

item.title: Ip ban..:S
item.dc:creator: @x_Java_Guru_x × Java Guru ×
item.description:
@x_Java_Guru_x wrote:

IP ban is not even coded in any server you moron.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip ban..:S
item.dc:creator: @Anon_Ftw Anon_Ftw
item.description:
@Anon_Ftw wrote:

They have a dynamic proxy, hence dynamic iP address, meaning you won’t be able to block it from your server. You keep banning thier accounts coming from that iP address, or shut down your server for about 3 hours. If this guy you’re trying to ban hates the server, then he won’t come back.

Read full topic

Tell me where it is?

Read full topic

item.description:
@x_Java_Guru_x wrote:

Actually the problem is @ your socket.

if(ipbanned(connectHost)) {
returnCode = 4;
} else {
//LoginMethod
}

item.title: Ip ban..:S
item.dc:creator: @xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx
item.description:
@xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx wrote:

ill let you use my ipban command?
here…

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 3) {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
PlayerHandler.kickNick = otherPName;
sendMessage(p.connectedFrom+" is now banned.");
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
bw.write(p.connectedFrom);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage("Error banning ip.");
}
}
}
}

for it to work after you ipban some one with that command you have to open up bannedip.txt and save it for the ip to be banned

Read full topic

item.title: Ip ban..:S
item.dc:creator: @xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx
item.description:
@xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx wrote:

ok you are useing a command right?
well if you are after you use the command dose it say in text box for rs2 that (the ip you banned) as been added to bannedip.txt?

if it dose you have to open bannedip.txt and save there for it to work

hope this helps

item.title: Ip ban..:S
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Unless it’s SYIPKPKER, in which case, you cant IP ban, because he uses a proxy that changes his IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip ban..:S
item.dc:creator: @fatcat fatcat
item.description:
@fatcat wrote:

If they mass login they still use the same i.p address.

IT should still stop them from making an account on your server, or at least banning them from when they log in again. are you sure there is’nt any problems with your server source?

OR… They could be using a cheat client, The client may have away to get past the i.p ban.

Read full topic

I really need to know how to fix this

item.title: Ip ban..:S
item.dc:creator: @fatcat fatcat
item.description:
@fatcat wrote:

They Either use Dial-up or have a dynamic ip, If that is the case there is nothing you can do about it.

-fatcat-
